document_data.name: Aryvandaar
document_data.mainbody: Known also as the '''Vyshaantar Empire''', '''Aryvandaar''' was a [[sun elf]] kingdom that fell during the [[Fifth Crown War]].

History.First Flowering:
The first settlements of Aryvandaar were founded around {{Yearlink|-23900}} in the area later known as the [[High Forest]].

Control of Aryvandaar was gained by the clan [[Vyshaan]] in {{Yearlink|-15300}}, under the leadership of [[Coronal]] [[Ivosaar Vyshaan]]. The [[Vyshaan|Vyshaanti]] of Aryvandaar claimed a family link to the ruling family of [[Miyeritar]]. They then attempted a peaceful annexation of [[Miyeritar]] which was resisted.
History.First Crown War: Aryvandaar began the [[First Crown War]] by invading [[Miyeritar]] in {{Yearlink|-12000}}. They also put pressure on [[Shantel Othreier]] to accept their rule or suffer the same. Miyeritar wasn't considered fully conquered until {{Yearlink|-11300}}.
History.Third Crown War: In {{Yearlink|-10900}} Aryvandaar, now the Vyshaantar Empire, ceased talks with Shantel Otheier and invaded, starting the [[Third Crown War]]. Around this time the Vyshaan lords gained a secret patron in [[Malkizid]], a fallen [[solar]]. The histories written by the victorious [[Vyshaan|Vyshaanti]] claim that Miyeritar was responsible. But in reality the high mages of Aryvandaar caused the killing storms.<ref name="LEoF-55>
History.Aftermath: In {{Yearlink|-3533}}, the [[Nether Scrolls]] were discovered by [[Finder (Netherese)|Finder]], a [[Netherese]] [[human]], within the area once controlled by Aryvandaar.

document_data.Geography: Aryvandaar encompassed the [[High Forest]], which in the days of the [[Crown Wars]] reached the [[River Dessarin]].
